name: @giancarl021/type-inference
description: Infer JavaScript types from a string

scripts.test: node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('ts-node/esm', pathToFileURL('./'));" index.test.ts
